description: This file defines a function to build a custom theme for a Flutter application using the Material 3 design system. It sets color schemes, UI element styles, and transition behaviors specific to an 'Ocean' theme.

classes.name: ColorScheme
classes.description: Defines the color palette for the theme, including primary, secondary, background, surface, error, and text colors.

classes.name: RoundedRectangleBorder
classes.description: Defines border shape with rounded corners for UI components.

classes.name: ThemeData
classes.description: Encapsulates the overall visual theme configuration for the application.

classes.name: InputDecorationTheme
classes.description: Specifies the styling for input fields.

classes.name: OutlineInputBorder
classes.description: Defines the border style for input fields.

classes.name: TextTheme
classes.description: Defines text styles used across the app.

methods.name: buildOceanTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object configured with the Ocean theme's visual styles.
